resources.string: At the start, all the disks will be on the left tower. Your goal is to move them all to one of the other towers by pushing the buttons beneath each tower. However, you must follow three rules.

The rules are simple: you can only move one disk at a time, you can only move the top disk on a tower, and you cannot put a disk on top of a smaller disk. When you choose to move a disk, it will be placed in a temporary slot at the top of the screen until you decide where to place it.
Increasing the number of disks will increase the challenge exponentially, so choose the size of your game carefully!
